title: Brooks B17 for Blue Lug
content:
This weekend, Japanese bicycle retailer Blue Lug is releasing its special edition Brooks B17 Saddles. The saddles will be released in stores on March 22nd (Sat) and 30th (Sun) online at 7 pm JST. Let’s take a closer look…

Each special edition Brooks B17 for Blue Lug comes with a Blue Lug reflector and are available in three classic finishes: black, brown and natural. Standard Brooks rails are now all-black, but the Blue Lug edition comes with chrome rails. There are also three Blue Lug colors for lacing.

There’s even a place for you to name your saddle on the side. Use a Dremel, rotary, or engraver tool.

 

 

Roll on over to Blue Lug to read more and get ready this Sunday for the online store drop. Blue Lug ships to the USA using DHL.
